blog_title: linux 运维 经常逛的几个官网文档
content:
• 代码仓库
    github https://github.com/
    gitee https://gitee.com/explore?
    git https://git-scm.com/docs
    gitlab极狐 https://docs.gitlab.cn/jh/index.html

  • redhat 7
    redhat https://access.redhat.com/documentation/zh-cn/red_hat_enterprise_linux/7

  • mysql
    mysql https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/

  • nginx
    nginx http://nginx.org/en/docs/

  • apache
    apache https://www.apache.org/

  • mycat 语雀
    mycat https://www.yuque.com/books/share/0576de75-ffc4-4c34-8586-952ae4636944/vttsnv

  • redis
    redis https://redis.io/docs/

  • ansible
    ansible https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/

  • zabbix
    zabbix https://www.zabbix.com/cn/download?zabbix=5.0&os_distribution=centos&os_version=7&db=mysql&ws=nginx

  • 普罗米修斯
    普罗米修斯 https://prometheus.io/docs/introduction/overview/

  • keepalived
    keepalived https://www.keepalived.org/

  • iptables
    iptables https://www.frozentux.net/iptables-tutorial/iptables-tutorial.html

  • jenkins
    jenkins https://www.jenkins.io/doc/

  • tcpdump
    tcpdump https://www.tcpdump.org/

  • jumpserver
    jumpserver https://www.jumpserver.org/

  • docker
    docker https://www.docker.com/

  • k8s
    k8s https://kubernetes.io/
